thread.title: Zac Efron and The Rock's Bromance Gets Put to the Test in the New Baywatch Trailer
thread.title_full: Zac Efron and The Rock's Bromance Gets Put to the Test in the New Baywatch Trailer

author: Kelsie Gibson
title: Zac Efron and The Rock's Bromance Gets Put to the Test in the New Baywatch Trailer
text:
Zac Efron and The Rock's Bromance Gets Put to the Test in the New Baywatch Trailer March 22, 2017 181 Shares Chat with us on Facebook Messenger. Learn what's trending across POPSUGAR. 
If you had any trepidation about the upcoming Baywatch movie, Dwayne Johnson and Zac Efron are here to ease your worries. The official trailer just dropped, and it looks hot, hot, hot. Not only does Efron gives us a peek at his incredible abs as he and The Rock compete in a refrigerator lifting contest (yes, seriously), but their onscreen bromance is already one of our new favorites. Plus, we also get a glimpse of Priyanka Chopra's villainous character. Catch the trailer above before the film hits theaters on May 26.
